job_history.work_description: Provide Patient care, Manage a team of CNA's, Injections, Diabetic management, CVA cases, Wound Care, GT management, Psych Care, Med Surg, Assited Living Care, IV care Management, etc

Provided nursing care for up to 30 residents simultaneously. Supervised up to 4 nursing assistant throughout the shift. Rendered care/medication administration to geriatric population on a daily basis.

Provided nursing care for up to 30 residents simultaneously. Supervised up to 4 nursing assistant throughout the shift. Rendered care/medication administration to geriatric population on a daily basis.
Assist and Open schedules for the nurses and other IDT to complete the MDS. Ensure that all data entered is accurate and acceptable for maximum amount of reimbursement from eHealth data.
Obtain venous blood samples from a variety of patients aging from infants to geriatrics.

skills.name: Nursing Care
skills.explanation: Over a decade of experience providing nursing care to geriatric populations, managing teams, and administering medications, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Team Management
skills.explanation: Consistently supervised teams of nursing assistants across multiple roles, suggesting strong proficiency in team management.

skills.name: Medication Administration
skills.explanation: Rendered care and medication administration to geriatric populations on a daily basis, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Patient Care
skills.explanation: Provided patient care for up to 30 residents simultaneously, demonstrating expert-level mastery in patient care.

skills.name: Phlebotomy
skills.explanation: Obtained venous blood samples from a variety of patients, suggesting strong proficiency in phlebotomy.

skills.name: Data Management
skills.explanation: Assisted with MDS coordination, ensuring accurate data entry for reimbursement purposes, showing a solid working proficiency in data management.

skills.name: Geriatric Care
skills.explanation: Provided care to geriatric populations across multiple roles, indicating strong proficiency in geriatric care.
